result.text:
The tech landscape is advancing rapidly. Are you ready for what's next? Time is running out to register for the 2025 #ForbesCIO Summit's virtual livestream happening next Tuesday Nov. 18! 

Don't get left behind and join C-Suite executives from Lockheed Martin, QuSecure and Asana as they explore the technologies on the horizon. From next-gen AI to quantum networks, they'll share how CIOs can prepare their organizations for tomorrow’s breakthroughs. Act now! Virtual registration is closing soon. https://t.co/m3xWietUrQ

result.text:
Forget cookies — there’s a “pervasive and hidden tracking technique” in Google Chrome on your iPhone or Android phone, and it “lets websites identify you even when cookies are blocked or you’re in private browsing.”

This is digital fingerprinting, which should have remained banned but came back to life earlier this year.  https://t.co/oYfQAzsx4L
